item.title: During the holiday season, Transamerica Life Bermuda and the World Wide Fund for Nature are advocating for the conservation of forests
item.description: Source: TLB/WWF. A booth for the Rewrap Project. Transamerica Life Bermuda (TLB), a life insurance provider for high-net-worth individuals, has teamed up with the World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) in Singapore to launch the Rewrap Project. The campaign, which will run until December 24, 2019, aims to raise awareness about the dangers of deforestation and the importance of forest conservation. All proceeds will support WWF’s conservation initiatives. In 2018 alone, Singapore generated about 1 million tonnes of paper waste.
